title: Concerns over inconsistent palliative care provision across England

title_detail.value: Concerns over inconsistent palliative care provision across England

summary: Palliative and end-of-life care are not being considered as core services by clinical commissioning groups (CCGs) in some parts of England, with a vast degree of variation across different services and regions, reveals a new analysis.

summary_detail.value: Palliative and end-of-life care are not being considered as core services by clinical commissioning groups (CCGs) in some parts of England, with a vast degree of variation across different services and regions, reveals a new analysis.
